body.name: VIVO Extra Long 37 to 80 inch TV Wall Mount for LCD LED Flat and Curved Screens, Long Extended Arm Swivel Mount, Max VESA 800x400mmm, Black, MOUNT-VW080L
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 16 - 21. Order within 4 hrs 40 mins.
features: Fits 37” to 80” TV’s - This heavy-duty extended TV wall mount is designed for 37” to 80” flat and curved screens with VESA 200x100mm, 200x200mm, 300x200mm, 300x300mm, 400x200mm, 400x300mm, 400x400mm, 600x200mm, 600x400mm, or 800x400mm hole patterns. Mounts to dual wall studs and brick/concrete surfaces.

Extra Long Folding Arm - Enjoy an extra long reach with this mount’s extended arm, making it possible to view your TV from multiple rooms in the house. You can also install it by a corner and swing the arm out for a perfect corner setup! Place your screen flush against the wall for a space-saving experience or fully extended for better viewing. The mount’s profile range is 3.2” to 40”.

Articulation - The bracket features +5° to -15° tilt, 180° swivel, and +3° to -3° screen leveling capability for glare reduction and comfortable viewing angles. Integrated cable management is included to keep cords protected during adjustments and organized for a clean display.

Sturdy 110 Lbs. Support - Rest assured that your large screen TV will be safe and secure on this solid steel mount that holds up to 110 lbs in weight. Built for scratch resistance and durability, the extended design will give your screen a hovering display for a fantastic movie experience!
We've Got You Covered - Sturdy steel design is backed with a 3 Year Manufacturer Warranty and friendly tech support to help with any questions or concerns.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enhance your viewing experience with the Long Arm TV Wall Mount (MOUNT-VW080L) from VIVO! The extra-long extension allows more placement options, enabling the screen to swing into a viewing area from a more secluded space. It’s designed to fit 37” to 80” flat and curved screens weighing up to 110 lbs with VESA hole patterns reaching 800x400mm. Features include all-steel construction for excellent support, screen articulation for optimal viewing angles, open architecture for superior ventilation, and integrated cable management for an organized appearance. The articulating arm swivels so you can position your screen’s angle for the best viewing experience. We provide all the necessary hardware and step-by-step instructions to get your TV properly mounted. We recommend installation to be a two person job, so grab a friend and enjoy a new ergonomic screen display!

SCREEN ARTICULATION This product features an extra long arm that extends outward to allow adequate space for large screens. The bracket has 3 swiveling joints for flexible placement, features tilt for glare reduction, and rotates slightly for screen leveling. Adjust your TV so it can be seen from anywhere in the room and even multiple places in the house! STURDY STEEL FRAME Constructed entirely of solid steel, this frame has a weight capacity of 110 lbs. Rest assured knowing that your TV is safe and secure. The unique design of this mount allows it to fit a variety of locations in your home, office, school, restaurant, gym, and more! COMPATIBILITY Screen Sizes: Fits most 37” to 80” TV’sScreen Type: Flat and Curved ScreensMounting Options: Dual Wood Studs, Brick/Concrete WallVESA Patterns: 200x100mm, 200x200mm, 300x200mm, 300x300mm, 400x200mm, 400x300mm, 400x400mm, 600x200mm, 600x400mm, 800x400mmWeight Capacity: 110 lbs SPECS Material: Steel (Black)Extension (Profile): 3.2” to 40”Wall Base Dimensions: 25.5” x 11.4”Bracket Dimensions: 34.9”L x 16.9”HArticulation: +5° to -15° tilt, 180° swivel (3 joints), Screen Leveling: +3° to -3° ADJUSTABLE SOLID COMPATIBLE SPECS

SCREEN MOUNTING MADE SIMPLE Secure Brackets to TV With the TV face down on a flat surface, secure the VESA brackets to the TV using the provided hardware. Please note, the hooks must be facing down once installed. Before step 2, please grab a buddy to help. Attach TV to Mount Hang the VESA brackets with TV onto the mount, making sure all 4 hooks are engaged with the horizontal bars. Flip the security bracket on each VESA bracket up, and insert the thumbscrews to secure. Route Cables Tame the messy cables by routing cords through the cable clip on the arm. This gives your TV mount an organized appearance and keeps cords out of the way when you’re adjusting screen angles. Screen Positioning Level the TV by slightly loosening the four nuts in the back, and tighten them again after leveling the screen. To adjust the TV tilt, slightly loosen the knob and two side bolts, find the perfect angle, and re-tighten.
VIVO TV Mounts ERGONOMIC SETUPS FOR YOUR VISUAL DISPLAY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best wall mount EVER
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought 2 of these and they are awesome! They are sturdy, easy to hang (with the right tools), worth every penny. My TV is a 55 inch and it does not have any issues or feel weak from the weight of the TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You’re definitely going to need a drill for this one. But it’s so sturdy and adjustable. I literally have nothing bad to say about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and versatile
reviews.reviewText: Selected this mount for a 40” tv positioned in the corner of a room. I needed a long extension arm and wide range of motion. Bingo. I can stow the tv flush into the shelf or bring it out into the room and turn and tilt so everyone can see the screen. Mounted to the wall very securely (designed to support a much larger tv). Comes with long screws for mounting into wall studs, but I added a few large drywall anchors for good measure. Very happy with this choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Needs better balance adjustment
reviews.reviewText: I wish this had better stabilization. When you turn it if always loses its balance and leaves me with a crooked tv.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Corner mount TV mount
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Recommend 2 person installation with good power drill. Awkward because of size and heavy to boot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Love it !
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. If you have a 65-80 inch tv i recommend getting a professional to put the mount up for you. My tv is a 75 inch and weights 110 pounds the mount is pretty sturdy and I love the fact I can adjust it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent wall mount and range of motion
reviews.reviewText: I had a unique situation for mounting my TV. I moved into an apartment with an old school box cut out over the fireplace. I need to get my TV past a 28 inch box where a TV used to go.I found this on Amazon and was impressed with a 40 inch reach. I had a friend install it who has a studfinder and he was done on about 30 minutes.It is sturdy and glides easy. I have had to get behind it to get to my router and maneuvering it was easy. I highly recommend this if you need this type of reach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Tilt adjustments broke and arm bends under weight causing leveling issues
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mount due to past excellent past experiences with Vivo products. I am very disappointed in this mount. The lower and upper tilt adjustment screws no longer tighten anything. I only noticed this when changing from a 55" to a 75" which weighs around 90 lbs. It kept tilting forward and I would keep trying to tighten the tilt adjustments and they just wouldn't tighten. Also, I had the mount nice and level prior to hanging the TV but the arm bends down so much that level was way off. Trying to get this thing level with the tilt not stable and seeing how much it was bending the arm had me all sort of paranoid. Not the level of confidence I want in holding my TV. Will be replacing with another brand mount and will have me reconsidering buying any Vivo products in the future.

It’s super heavy which means it’s made well. Holds my 43” fire tv at least a couple feet perpendicular to the wall easily. It would be nice if the viewing angle had a little greater range of motion and for better or worse the tv brackets slide horizontally on the mounting arms which make adjustments a bit tedious, I will probably zip tie them in place. Overall it does exactly what I wanted.
Great quality Very well made + all bolts screws and tools included Very pleased with Purchase
This TV mount was exactly what I was looking for, it is exactly as described and easy to mount. I am pleased with this purchase. Fits in my living room as sought. It is sturdy and strong.
its a two person job, but it works very well, and was the third one we tried, well worth the money and stronger than others for more money

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to install and very sturdy
